document.discussion_title: How Recession Concerns Are Impacting Buy-Sell Equations | GlobeSt.com
document.topic_text: Pontius to Lead Specialty Divisions for Marcus & Millichap April 25, 2016 CALABASAS, CA—Most recently national director of Marcus & Millichap’s National Office and Industrial Properties Group, Pontius succeeds Hessam Nadji, now president and CEO, in his new capacity. Veteran Wall St., RE Exec Named Steinbridge Group CEO April 25, 2016 NEW YORK CITY—Named one of Real Estate Forum's top 50 real estate executives under the age of 40 last November, the new hire will oversee New York City-based Steinbridge Group’s day-to-day operations and transaction pipeline. Dept. Stores Must Downsize Faster: Green Street April 25, 2016 NEWPORT BEACH, CA—Sales generated by lower-performing stores in larger markets would be better served by going to online channels, Green Street Advisors says in a new report. The Best of Development April 25, 2016 Our annual Development and Capital Issue takes an inside look at the leading projects, people and trends in the business.
